properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:31AM EST until January 30 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in South Carolina...

Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun...Lexington
and Richland Counties

Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun
and Richland Counties

.Hydroelectric power generation and dam releases combined with upstream
runoff entering the Congaree is expected to create minor flooding.

The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden
* from Monday afternoon to late Wednesday night...Or until the
warning is cancelled.
* At  9 AM Sunday the stage was 8.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Monday afternoon
And crest around 15.9 feet Tuesday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage Wednesday January 29.
* At 15.0 feet...Flooding begins in the Congaree National Park. This
will begin to produce flooding of portions of the lower boardwalk.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The
water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to
play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to noaa weather radio...
local media or the internet for further statements and updated
forecasts.
